pointOnLineGetter.comment: Choose a calculator for the defense point on the shoot vector of the enemy bot.

minDistShootVector.comment: If the defender is closer than this distance to the shoot vector, he will get a new position on the shoot vector.

nearEnemyBotDist.comment: Distance around the enemies offensive bot the defender will optimize its position

xLimit.comment: Maximum x position of the defendenders

maxXDefender.comment: Defenders will not drive behind this x value

minDistDefenderBall.comment: Minimum distance of the double block to the ball

defendDistance.comment: Distance of the defense point to the enemies bot
Distance of the defense point to the enemies bot

ballPossessionDist.comment: distance difference needed between our and the enemies nearest bot to the ball to declare the ball possessed by us

minimumNumDefenders.comment: The minimum number of defenders demanded at all times in the game

forceDoubleBlockAtPenAreaKickoff.comment: Force the double block to retreat to the penalty area at kickoff

ballLookaheadOfDefenders.comment: Time [s] - the position of the future ball will be used to determine the danger from the ball position

doubleDefXValue.comment: negative xValue of the ball to set double defenders

blockAngle.comment: Range: (0, pi / 2): If the angle between ball and x axis is greater than this value only one defender will try to block the ball
